Invalid username. It should be no more than 128 characters and may contain only letters, numbers, and _ . @ characters.

Login failed
The account is locked due to too many failed login attempts. Please try again in 5 minutes.
Invalid verification code. Please try again.

Authentication error
Invalid username. It should start with a letter and be no more than 20 characters. It can contain letters, numbers and "_".
User alias can neither exceed 100 bytes in length nor contain sensitive words.
